openSource.name: event-pipeline
openSource.description: A package for building pipelines in Python using pointy-lang which is a DSL for writing pipelines in an easy to read manner. Very useful for ML pipelines and any type of pipeline where gathering data is important.

apps.name: Type Terminal
apps.description: A typing test application built for the terminal. It allows users to test their typing speed and accuracy. It also is accessible through ssh. Built with Golang and Charm

apps.name: Dino Explore
apps.description: A terminal based version of the Google Dino game that shows up when there's no internet connection. Built with C#

apps.name: Copter
apps.description: A cross-platform project management desktop application for managing projects among teams in a company. Built with Avalonia UI(C#) and Supabase.

apps.name: BoaMe
apps.description: Uber but for cleaners. An android application that allows students to book a personal cleaner for some section of their flats.Built with Java and Firebase

apps.name: Smart Tag
apps.description: Large size classroom manageement system application using NFC technology. Includes a personalized impersonation detection algorithm that predicts students likely to miss classes based on weights. Built with React Native and Node Js

apps.name: Eirhub
apps.description: A doctor patient communication application that allows doctors to manage their patients by prescribing medicine to them and booking online video call meetings.
